subject: Re: Order #SSN3892 confirmed
description_text:
Hello
I have just received this order but the front height plate was not in the box. 
Look forward to hearing from you. 
ThanksMark Forbes

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Forbes,  The base plate is currently out of stock, but we will provide you with a tracking number as soon as possible. Please rest assured.
Hi Mark Forbes,  Please provide photos of all the items you received, and I will help check which part is missing.

Hello
I am in the process of trying to return the whole pedal set but the heel tightening plate was not included with the original delivery. So now I'm trying to return them I would just like that on record that it was not included. 
ThanksMark Forbes

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

Hello
Since I cannot return the item I would like the heighting plate/heel plate to be sent to me when it comes back in stock. 
Thank youMark Forbes 

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

Hello 
Do you have an estimated date for when the heel plate will be back in stock? 
I look forward to hearing from you on this outstanding issue. 
Thanks
Mark Forbes

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer
Hi Mark Forbes,    We apologize for the delayed response. We will arrange for a replacement immediately. May I ask if this is the part you are missing?

Hello
Yes that is the part that was missing from the order
Thank youMark Forbes

Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer
Hi Mark Forbes,    Alright, we'll arrange for a replacement to be sent to you immediately.
